text.section:
A county board may bring condemnation proceedings to acquire land under Title 12 of the Real Property Article if:
Land is required for any school purpose; and
The county board is unable to contract with the owner of the land for what the board considers to be a fair valuation.
The county board may ask the county commissioners or county council to assist it in bringing condemnation proceedings.
